concept.title: Policies
concept.shortdesc: The syllabus should contain all of the policies for the class.

conbody.p:
The relevant information for policies includes:
A high-level section overview that leads into all of the policy subsections
Multiple subsections, one subsection for each policy

example.title: Example
example.p: The only way for me to manage this course fairly and objectively is to follow the policies of this syllabus consistently and unequivocally for every student, regardless of circumstances.
